mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, userId, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, reg_date) VALUES (bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId=m.userId

SELECT b.num, b.userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, b.reg_date, saveFilename, originalFilename, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM bbs b JOIN member m ON b.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM bbsLike GROUP BY num ) bc ON b.num = bc.num WHERE b.num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bbsLike WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbsReply(replyNum, num, userId, content, answer, reg_date) VALUES (bbsReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{answer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbsReply WHERE num=#{num} AND answer=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT r.replyNum, r.userId, userName, num, content, r.reg_date, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount, NVL(disLikeCount, 0) disLikeCount FROM bbsReply r JOIN member m ON r.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM bbsReply WHERE answer!=0 GROUP BY answer ) a ON r.replyNum = a.answer LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNum, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 1, 1)) likeCount, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 0, 1)) disLikeCount FROM bbsReplyLike GROUP BY replyNum ) c ON r.replyNum = c.replyNum WHERE num=#{num} AND r.answer=0 ORDER BY r.replyNum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}
SELECT replyNum, num, r.userId, userName, content, reg_date, answer FROM bbsReply r JOIN member m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE answer = #{answer} ORDER BY replyNum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbsReply WHERE answer = #{answer}
